Text: Thanks for this STFmaryville. Really wish the WTF covers wouldnt have spoilers on them. =
yeah i felt like they (meaning the creative teams) were rushed to do this, and it takes some thinking to do a good one without giving away too much.

@ahlat
Well, the cover does draw you in... until you see Simon. Then yeah, there be mad spoilers. I think. Haven't read it, but it does make me want to know how Simon became a White Lantern.
well hey maybe it works then. i think that's def. the INTENT: draw in readers who don't usually buy a title
